name: Captain Memo Game
description:
Welcome to "Captain Memo" !
This game is for people of all ages.
Train your brain and remind cards position.
Find similar cards to earn points and make combo when pairs are successively found.
You can play against the computer, with someone on the same device or online with game center.
Win against "Captain Memo" and increase difficulties.
32 levels to become the greatest pirate of seven seas !!

Rules :

1/ Progress :
Choose the player who's begin. He turns two cards :
if the cards are similar, you earn one point and can replay to make combo.
if the cards are different, that's the turn of the other player

2/ Winner :
When all similar cards has been found, the winner is the gamer with the most of points.
When draw, the computer win.

3/ Special card :
"Diamond" card has a value of four points
"Captain Memo" (Pirate Parrot) card has a value of three points
"Treasure chest" card has a value of two points

4/ Combo
Points are cumulated.
The amount of points earn with combos are indicated next the total point of gamer.

5/ Tip
Begin combo with special card to earn more points with combo.

Enjoy yourselves !!
